body_html: Also had this issue building TF master from source with Bazel 0.19.2, and joseortiz3's suggested fix of manually specifying the path to the grep binary in cuda_configure.bzl (though now on line 562) unblocked my build.

body: Also had this issue building TF master from source with Bazel 0.19.2, and joseortiz3's suggested fix of manually specifying the path to the grep binary in cuda_configure.bzl (though now on line 562) unblocked my build.
